channel.title: [PI] Original virtue Help!
channel.description:
I got errors everywhere, same as everyone else :( heres forum link: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=652803.0
f[u][i][b]or the server run.bat:[/b][/i][/u]
Running --- --- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/runetoplist/VoteC hecker at game.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:68) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.runetoplist.VoteChecker at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 1 more Press any key to continue . . .
[i][b]for the compiler:[/b][/i]
javac: file not found: src\engine\packet\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Cant find the packet? The only 'packet' named file was lcoated in srs/engine/network :(
this is how it looks like now:
@echo off :build cls "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.8.0_31\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\game\*.java src\game\combat\*.java src\game\content\quests\*.java src\game\content\*.java src\game\content\travel\*.java src\game\item\*.java src\game\minigame\*.java src\game\npc\*.java src\game\object\*.java src\game\skill\summoning\*.java src\game\player\*.java src\game\shop\*.java src\game\skill\*.java src\engine\event\*.java src\engine\network\*.java src\engine\packet\*.java src\engine\task\*.java src\engine\util\*.java src\game\skill\dung\*.java src\engine\world\*.java pause
[u][i][b]for the client Run: [/b][/i][/u]
*FIXED*
If you could please help me with this! Might even learn from this :)

item.title: [PI] Original virtue Help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’d just use an IDE and skip using the compiler entirely…
http://eclipse.org
https://netbeans.org

There’s 2 great options.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Original virtue Help!
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

i would change compiler to this;

@echo off :build cls "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.8.0_31\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
as for the run.bat, it might be SQL error, or just your java needs updated.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Original virtue Help!
item.dc:creator: @ikzenrob ikzenrob
item.description:
@ikzenrob wrote:

I got errors everywhere, same as everyone else
heres forum link: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=652803.0

for the server run.bat:

Running

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/runetoplist/VoteC
hecker
at game.Server.(Server.java:68)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.runetoplist.VoteChecker
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
… 1 more
Press any key to continue . . .

for the compiler:

javac: file not found: src\engine\packet*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Cant find the packet? The only ‘packet’ named file was lcoated in srs/engine/network

this is how it looks like now:

@echo off
:build
cls
"C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.8.0_31\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\game*.java src\game\combat*.java src\game\content\quests*.java src\game\content*.java src\game\content\travel*.java src\game\item*.java src\game\minigame*.java src\game\npc*.java src\game\object*.java src\game\skill\summoning*.java src\game\player*.java src\game\shop*.java src\game\skill*.java src\engine\event*.java src\engine\network*.java src\engine\packet*.java src\engine\task*.java src\engine\util*.java src\game\skill\dung*.java src\engine\world*.java
pause

for the client Run:

FIXED

If you could please help me with this! Might even learn from this

Read full topic
